## Icon.getIconLocation() method

Returns the center of the block's icon relative to the surface.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getIconLocation(): Coordinate | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) \| null

Object with x and y properties in workspace coordinates.
